Contact

There are a few ways to get in touch:

  • Open an issue to discuss something in one of the issues pages of our text repositories on GitHub
  • Chat with us in our chat room on Gitter
  • Contact the project leader, Jonathan Reeve, at jonathan.reeve@columbia.edu
Open Editions
